channel.title: Cafe con Leche XML News and Resources Recommended Reading
channel.description: Cafe con Leche is the preeminent independent source of XML information on the net. Cafe con Leche is neither beholden to specific companies nor to advertisers. At Cafe con Leche you'll find many resources to help you develop your XML skills here including daily news summaries, examples, book reviews, mailing lists and more.

item.title: Debtors Search for Discipline via Blogs (New York Times)
Comcast Customer Uses "Unlimited Service" Excessively, Gets Disconnected For A Year (www.consumerist.com)
